Description: Directed by Vincent Gallo.  With Vincent Gallo, Christina Ricci, Ben Gazzara, Mickey Rourke. Billy is released after five years in prison. In the next moment, he kidnaps teenage student Layla and visits his parents with her, pretending she is his girlfriend and they will soon marry (and forcing her to say the same).
